task_title: Watch my YouTube video and make a comment
task_detail: Watch a 10-minute video on my YouTube channel and leave a relevant comment below the video.
submission_info: Screenshot of your comment along with the video timecode.

task_title: Complete a short survey and submit feedback
task_detail: Fill out a 5-minute survey about customer experience and submit detailed feedback.
submission_info: Proof of survey completion (screenshot of feedback submission).

task_title: Test mobile app and report bugs
task_detail: Download the mobile app, test the features, and report any bugs you find.
submission_info: Detailed bug report and screenshots of issues found.

task_title: Design a logo for my website
task_detail: Create a unique logo for my new website that reflects the brand's identity.
submission_info: Submit your logo design as a .png or .jpg file.

task_title: Provide data entry for a research project
task_detail: Input data from scanned documents into an Excel spreadsheet.
submission_info: Submit the Excel file with all the data entries.

task_title: Write a blog post on SEO strategies
task_detail: Write a detailed blog post (1000-1500 words) on the latest SEO strategies.
submission_info: Submit the post in .docx or .pdf format.

task_title: Create a social media post for an event
task_detail: Design an eye-catching social media post to promote an upcoming event.
submission_info: Submit the social media post as a .jpg or .png image.

task_detail: Navigate through the website and test for user-friendliness and ease of use.
submission_info: Submit a detailed usability report and any issues found.

task_title: Translate a document from English to Spanish
task_detail: Translate a 10-page document from English to Spanish accurately.
submission_info: Submit the translated document in .docx format.

task_detail: Design an attention-grabbing thumbnail for a YouTube video on tech tutorials.
submission_info: Submit the thumbnail image in .png format.
